original_text: The two-horned ram that you saw represents the kings of Media and Persia.
korean_text: 네가 본 바 두 뿔 가진 숫양은 곧 메대와 바사 왕들이요

sentences.original_text: The two-horned ram that you saw
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 본 두 뿔 가진 수염소는

sentences.original_text: represents the kings of Media and Persia.
